device_models: HTC Mozart smartphones; custom built multi-touch surfaces
use_cases_desc:
- Word Game, which is similar to scrabble
- Collage Designer where users can add photos from their smartphones to a tabletop and collaboratively create a collage of their photos
- Music Store where a user can browse through a music collection and listen to songs of an album; and buy songs from a store
- Calendar, where users can share their calendars on a shared screen
contribution_desc:
The "contribution is an interaction style that fuses direct manipulation interactions of three kinds: interactions we perform on mobiles, multi-touch interactions on surfaces, and stylus-like use of mobiles on a surface."

The applications where tested with six users (graduate students) and qualitative feedback for each application was collected/reported
tracking_characteristic: Identity; Location 2D; Outside-in tracking; Inside-out tracking
